ComicInfo.Summary:
Halby calls a girl who gave him her number five years previously.
Trypto is beset by ghosts.
A fragment of alien debris lands among the contents of a garbage boat and a giant monster emerges.
ComicInfo.Title: Doc Spin: Agent Of A.C.R.O.N.Y.M.; 5 Years Ago And Counting [Part 1]; Trypto the Acid Dog; Gorehemoth - The Garbage Heap That Walks Like A Man
